page.title: 17St.Nicholas Parish Church.
page.content: Sunday services at this Chislehurst Parish Church are as follows: 8.00 a.m. Holy Eucharist 9.30 a.m. Sung Eucharist 11.15 a.m. Matins 6.00 p.m. Evensong Matins and evensong are held every Weekday and a service of Holy Communion is held on Wednesday and Friday mornings.At evensong on the second Sunday of each month there are prayers for the sick and the laying on of hands There are two Sunday Schools and a creche during sung eucharist.A youth Club is held on Sunday night. Other groups are:Young Wives, Mothers Union,Wednesday Circle(for men and women),Bible study groups and the choir.the choir consists of men,women, boys and girls.
